title: Attitude Control Simulation
summary: Built a rigid-body attitude dynamics + PID controller simulation and evaluated performance across disturbances.

content.problem: Design and validate an attitude controller for a rigid-body spacecraft under disturbances and sensor noise.
approach: Designed PID control with rate damping and actuator saturation.
Ran Monte Carlo tests across inertia uncertainty and external torques.
results: Settling time < 10 s for nominal inertia case.
Max pointing error < 0.5Â° under bounded disturbances (representative test).
Monte Carlo: stable across tested inertia variations.

title: EKF Sensor Fusion (IMU + GPS)
summary: Implemented an EKF for 2D navigation and compared performance to dead reckoning under varying noise conditions.

content.problem: Fuse IMU and GPS to estimate position/velocity robustly in noisy conditions.
approach: Defined state vector and motion model.
results: Reduced RMS position error vs. dead reckoning (representative test).
Stable filter behavior across multiple noise scenarios.
